document.full_text: search teams snaking a tiny camera through newly drilled bore holes have found a void in the rubble of a cave-in that trapped an idaho silver miner, the first sign in five days that he might have survived.
document.title: bore-hole cameras find void near trapped idaho miner
lines_and_colors: search teams snaking a tiny camera through newly drilled bore holes have found a void in the rubble of a cave-in that trapped an idaho silver miner, the first sign in five days that he might have survived.
